page.title: 04GRINDLEFORD CARNIVAL
page.content: CARNIVAL DAY ======== === Saturday is the main day for the {carnival}.It has a{fancy dress}and a lot of side stalls in the afternoon.In the evening there is a{boat race}and {barbecue.}The fancy dress has a lot of age groups .Even some grown-ups dress up. After the prizes there is a{parade. There was a large roundabout that attracted a lot of people although one or two were sick on it.The boats in the{boat race}are usually home-made ones so some of them have to be pushed. The winner got a bottle of wine and so did the first girls in.After this was the barbecue. Hot-dogs were 25p,beefburgers were 30p and soup was 15p.There was pop music as well.
